dt2.14:5.1: Rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.14:5.2: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.14:5.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.14:6.6: manindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.14:6.7: Te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.14:6.9: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.14:7.8: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.14:7.10: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.14:8.8: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.14:8.10: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi, ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.14:10.2: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.14:10.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:11.5: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
